verses.name: Matthew 26:39
verses.text: And he went a little further, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.

verses.name: Matthew 26:40
verses.text: And he cometh unto the disciples, and findeth them asleep, and saith unto Peter, What, could ye not watch with me one hour?

verses.name: Matthew 26:41
verses.text: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.
